name: Browney!
description:
This is an interactive game in which you get to see the earliest stages of a future game, Browney Life. 

Being a small Pokemon fangame prototype, there's only a few things to do, although they are mildly amusing. New things may come up in the future, and you will be able to do more!

Browney is a little Steenee who loves to be annoying! She will:

-look at you like you killed someone

-screech

-get squished by the squisher-block

-have her eyes poked if you want!

-and more!

This game is an early prototype, so it will not look very good. Bugs may be encountered. 

Enjoy, and remember: It got squishy and be like behh!
